title: Pac-Man
description: Guide Pac-Man through a maze, eat pellets, and avoid ghosts.

title: Donkey Kong
description: Rescue the princess from the clutches of Donkey Kong.

title: Space Invaders
description: Defend the Earth from descending aliens by shooting them down.

title: Galaga
description: Control a spaceship and defeat waves of alien enemies.

title: Tetris
description: Arrange falling blocks to complete lines and score points.

title: Centipede
description: Shoot and destroy a centipede as it moves across the screen.

title: Super Mario Bros.
description: Embark on an adventure to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser.

title: Donkey Kong Jr.
description: Help Donkey Kong Jr. save his father from Mario's clutches.

title: Frogger
description: Guide frogs across busy roads and rivers without getting hit.

title: Mortal Kombat
description: Engage in brutal combat against opponents in a tournament.

title: Dig Dug
description: Dig tunnels, defeat enemies, and inflate them until they pop.

title: Street Fighter II
description: Engage in intense hand-to-hand combat with a variety of fighters.

title: Q*bert
description: Change the colors of cubes to clear levels and avoid enemies.

title: Raiden
description: Pilot a fighter aircraft to defeat enemy forces and bosses.

title: Asteroids
description: Navigate a spaceship through an asteroid field and shoot them down.

title: Galaxian
description: Control a spaceship and defeat groups of enemy aliens.

title: Arkanoid
description: Bounce a ball against bricks to destroy them and clear levels.
